ygData.subject: Freeport Quest Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, I am a new Paladin located in the city of Freeport.  I ran across a quest where by I would deliver a message to one of our fellow brothers hiding
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings, I am a new Paladin located in the city of Freeport. I ran across
a quest where by I would deliver a message to one of our fellow brothers
hiding undercover in the Freeport Militia. Unfortunately, he was killed but
not before giving me a note with information about Zimel's Blades, which I
presume is a merchant shop of some type. I returned with this info to the
lady paladin, and she sent me to the Office of the People to speak with
Rashinda, but I seem to have hit a roadblock as I cannot get Rashinda to
reply to me. Does anyone know is this quest is working, and if so how I
might can continue it, or is the outcome not worth the trouble?

Thanks
